name: nightingale-monorepo
description: Logger for browser and node, see [nightingale](packages/nightingale) to get started !
author: Christophe Hurpeau <christophe@hurpeau.com> (https://christophe.hurpeau.com)

scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach -Avp --topological-dev run build && yarn run build:definitions && yarn run generate:docs
scripts.generate:docs: rm -Rf docs ; yarn run generate:api ; touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:prettier && yarn run lint:eslint
scripts.preversion: yarn run lint && yarn run build && repository-check-dirty
scripts.release: GH_TOKEN=$POB_GITHUB_TOKEN lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate --create-release=github -m 'chore: release' && lerna publish from-git

resolutionsExplained.@types/node: Avoid problems in typescript with several versions of @types/node
